body.p: The couchbase-cli tool is located in the following paths, depending upon the platform. This tool can perform operations on an entire cluster, on a bucket shared across an entire cluster, or on a single node in a cluster. For instance, if this tool is used to create a data bucket, all nodes in the cluster have access the bucket.
Many of these same settings can be performed using the REST API.
